Posts.Content: Aug 26, 2014 05:56PM luvaussies wrote: When I had to wait it was suggested to me to call everyday to see if they had any cancellations - it didn't work for me but I work at the hospital and I started advising patients that called our office stressed and anxious over the wait to try calling and it worked for some and they got theirs moved up.  I'm sorry this happened to you - I'll say a prayer you get moved up quickly.

Posts.Content: Aug 24, 2014 09:11AM luvaussies wrote: I have a mirena was inserted in 2010 due to heavy menstrual bleeding.  Just turned 50 in June and now have an asymmetry in BOTH breasts and am going for diagnostic mammo & ultrasound if necessary on Tuesday 8/26.  I am scared to death.  Good luck on Wednesday will be praying for good results for you.
